title: Sci-fi romance that is truly original
review: This is a film that's for everyone. David Bowie has died and the world will turn upside down for one woman. SPEED OF LIFE offers a love story within some seriously bizarre and strange circumstances. But when is love actually normal?

title: Superb Acting
review: Makings of a great movie but screenwriters and editors clearly championed 2 different hypothesis and epilogues for this movie but Ann Dowd is phenomenal as usual!

title: Screened at USC and Loved It!
review:
I was fortunate to catch a screening of this film at USC shortly before its online premiere.

Short, simple, and touching. I loved the relationships in the film, the tongue in cheek jokes about the future, and the emotions behind moving on.
